simplifiedChinese.title: Cornelius' Conversion
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What God-given guidance can you observe in this passage?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: Put yourself in the passage and envision what it might have been like to receive this guidance. How does this relate to you and your family today?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: What God-inspired encouragement can you observe in this passage? How can you experience more of this in your own life?
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Write a poem about what this encouragement means for you.
